datasetScan.name: NEXRAD Level II Radar from IDD

metadata.documentation: NEXRAD Level II Radar WSR-88D from IDD. Sent every 5 minutes.

variable.name: Reflectivity
variable.vocabulary_name: EARTH SCIENCE > Spectral/Engineering > Radar > Radar Reflectivity

variable.name: Velocity
variable.vocabulary_name: EARTH SCIENCE > Spectral/Engineering > Radar > Doppler Velocity

variable.name: SpectrumWidth
variable.vocabulary_name: EARTH SCIENCE > Spectral/Engineering > Radar > Doppler Spectrum Width

datasetScan.name: NEXRAD Level III Radar from IDD

metadata.documentation: The NIDS data feed provides roughly 20 radar products sent every 5-10 minutes from 154 sites over NOAAPORT broadcast. These "derived" products include base reflectivity and velocity, composite reflectivity, precipitation estimates, echo tops and VAD winds

documentation.xlink:title: Unidata description of NOAAPORT radar data

datasetScan.name: TDWR Level III Radar from IDD

metadata.documentation: The TDWR data feed provides roughly 20 radar products sent every 5-10 minutes from 154 sites over NOAAPORT broadcast. These "derived" products include base reflectivity and velocity

documentation.xlink:title: Unidata description of NOAAPORT radar data
